metadata.title: CVE-2024-53432 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: While parsing certain malformed PLY files, PCL version 1.14.1 crashes dueto an uncaught std::out_of_range exception in PCLPointCloud2::at. Thisissue could potentially be exploited to cause a denial-of-service (DoS)attack when processing untrusted PLY files.

criterions.comment: pcl package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
